message:
### Error querying database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLDataException: ORA-01861: 리터럴이 형식 문자열과 일치하지 않음

### The error may exist in file [/uncttos/new_home.ear/ROOT.war/WEB-INF/classes/co/kr/unct/es/query/es010_100Qry.xml]
### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: /* es010_100Qry.selectBerthScheduleList */   SELECT    ROWNUM RNUM,    AA,    VSB_VOY,    VSB_VOY_VESSEL,    VOYAGE,    CDV_VSL_OPERATOR,    VSB_VOY_EVOYAGEIN,    VSB_VOY_EVOYAGEOUT,    CCT,    ETB,    TO_DATE(ETB,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ETB_DATE,    ETD,    TO_DATE(ETD,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ETD_DATE,    NVL(VSB_VOY_DISVAN, 0) VSB_VOY_DISVAN,    NVL(VSB_VOY_LOADVAN, 0) VSB_VOY_LOADVAN,    NVL(VSB_VOY_TSVAN, 0) VSB_VOY_SHIFTVAN,    NVL(VSB_VOY_SHIFTVAN, 0) VSB_VOY_TSVAN,    BB AS POSITION,    VSB_VOY_BERTHNO,    VSB_VOY_OUTSERVICE,    VSB_VOY_STATUS,    VSB_VOY_OTHERTML,    CDV_VSL_NAME,    CDV_VSL_LENGTH,    VSB_VOY_BERTHSIDE,    VSB_VOY_STARTPOS,    CDV_VSL_STERN,    VSB_VOY_REMARKS,    VSB_VOY_FOREMAN_NAME,    VSB_VOY_FOERMAN_PHONE   FROM(     SELECT      A.VSB_VOY_VESSEL || '-' || A.VSB_VOY_VOYAGE AA,      A.VSB_VOY_VESSEL || '-' || SUBSTR(A.VSB_VOY_VOYAGE, 1, 3) VSB_VOY,      A.VSB_VOY_VESSEL,      SUBSTR(A.VSB_VOY_VOYAGE, 1, 3) VOYAGE,      B.CDV_VSL_OPERATOR,      A.VSB_VOY_EVOYAGEIN,      A.VSB_VOY_EVOYAGEOUT,      TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.VSB_VOY_CUTOFF_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_CUTOFF_TIME , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') CCT,      DECODE(A.VSB_VOY_STATUS, 'P', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(A.VSB_VOY_ESTBER_DATE, NULL, A.VSB_VOY_ESTARR_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ESTARR_TIME, A.VSB_VOY_ESTBER_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ESTBER_TIME) , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'A', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(A.VSB_VOY_ACTBER_DATE, NULL, A.VSB_VOY_ACTARR_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ACTARR_TIME, A.VSB_VOY_ACTBER_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ACTBER_TIME) , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'D', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(A.VSB_VOY_ACTBER_DATE, NULL, A.VSB_VOY_ACTARR_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ACTARR_TIME, A.VSB_VOY_ACTBER_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ACTBER_TIME) , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) ETB,      DECODE(A.VSB_VOY_STATUS, 'P', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.VSB_VOY_ESTDEP_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ESTDEP_TIME , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'A', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.VSB_VOY_ESTDEP_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ESTDEP_TIME , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'D', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.VSB_VOY_ACTDEP_DATE || A.VSB_VOY_ACTDEP_TIME , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) ETD,      A.VSB_VOY_DISVAN VSB_VOY_DISVAN,      A.VSB_VOY_LOADVAN VSB_VOY_LOADVAN,      A.VSB_VOY_TSVAN VSB_VOY_TSVAN,      A.VSB_VOY_SHIFTVAN VSB_VOY_SHIFTVAN,      A.VSB_VOY_BERTHNO || '(' || NVL(A.VSB_VOY_BERTHSIDE, 'P')|| ')' BB,      A.VSB_VOY_BERTHNO,      A.VSB_VOY_OUTSERVICE,      A.VSB_VOY_STATUS,      A.VSB_VOY_OTHERTML,      B.CDV_VSL_NAME,      B.CDV_VSL_LENGTH,      A.VSB_VOY_BERTHSIDE,      A.VSB_VOY_STARTPOS,      B.CDV_VSL_STERN,      A.VSB_VOY_REMARKS,      A.VSB_VOY_FOREMAN_NAME,      A.VSB_VOY_FOERMAN_PHONE     FROM      VSB_VOYAGE A,      CDV_VESSEL B     WHERE             ( DECODE(A.VSB_VOY_ESTBER_DATE,NULL,A.VSB_VOY_ESTARR_DATE,A.VSB_VOY_ESTBER_DATE) >= ? /* #from:VARCHAR# '20191201' */          OR A.VSB_VOY_ESTWKC_DATE between ? and ? /* #to:VARCHAR# '20191210'*/ )      AND A.VSB_VOY_ESTARR_DATE <= ?             AND (A.VSB_VOY_ESTDEP_DATE >= ?  OR A.VSB_VOY_ACTDEP_DATE >= ? )      AND SUBSTR(A.VSB_VOY_VESSEL,0,2) != 'OD'      AND A.VSB_VOY_VESSEL=B.CDV_VSL_CODE(+)      AND A.VSB_VOY_CANCEL IS NULL      AND A.VSB_VOY_VESSEL NOT IN ('OTHR','BOND','STOR','DUMY','HJXX','ZZRN','STRF','SBRF')     ORDER BY ETD   )
### Cause: java.sql.SQLDataException: ORA-01861: 리터럴이 형식 문자열과 일치하지 않음

; ORA-01861: 리터럴이 형식 문자열과 일치하지 않음
; nested exception is java.sql.SQLDataException: ORA-01861: 리터럴이 형식 문자열과 일치하지 않음
